tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50),
	age INT,
	diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
	treatment_plan VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  doctor_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  address TEXT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_appointments (
  appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES telemedicine_patients(patient_id),
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_doctors (
  doctor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialization VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  practice_address TEXT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES telemedicine_patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id INT REFERENCES telemedicine_doctors(doctor_id),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  record_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  doctor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id INT REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  medication_name STRING,
  dosage INT
);
